snippet.title: Alien Hallway Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
http://www.sigma-team.net/games/action/alien-hallway.html

Teleport detected several new planets in the Universe. The objects are inhabited by unknown creatures and the population is growing! Your detachment was chosen for a special mission. Visit all the objects and destroy any forms of life you meet! Save the Earth! You will be supported with all necessary weapons and armor. Execute!

Featuring:
Totally new action-strategy game from Alien Shooter series makers!
Alien Hallway lets you control an entire army using superpower skills. Planets are getting invaded incredibly fast so you got to react even faster! Watch classic green-headed aliens! The whole race from larva till adults is reproduced!
Shoot green beasts, throw powerful grenades and upgrade your troops by simple mouse click. Easy campaign game-play let's you forget about everything and get absorbed into intense action same time making the game attractive for all kinds of players. 
Start from easy level and train your army till extreme! 
Go through several three-dimensional battlefields to destroy severe monsters and lead your troops to victory!
Your armory includes super powerful airstrike, three grenade types and various weapons. Use the ability to upgrade the base and the units. Aliens also have wide variety of weapons.
Save your soldiers to get more stars. Get the gold after the level successfully passed. 
Changing settings same as bloom and glow effects create captivating atmosphere so you can't stop until the mission is executed.
Fascinating soundtracks reproduce full intensity of the battle breathing life into the game!
